name: SCULPTOR CAPITAL MANAGEMENT
sampleDescriptions: Monitor activities related to the Securities and Exchange Commission.
Educate Members of Congress on responsible investment management practices.
Monitor SEC-related issues and implementation of COVID-19 legislation.
Monitor proposals related to carried interest, including H.R. 1068, Carried Interest Fairness Act of 2021.
Monitor SEC-related issues and implementation of COVID-19 legislation; monitor nominations for the financial regulators; monitor committee activity related to retail trading and equity markets.
Monitor proposals related to carried interest, including H.R. 1068, Carried Interest Fairness Act of 2021 and the Build Back Better Act; monitor tax proposals related to capital gains.
Monitor SEC-related issues; monitor nominations for the financial regulators; monitor committee activity related to retail trading and equity markets.

Monitor proposals related to carried interest, including H.R. 1068, Carried Interest Fairness Act of 2021 and H.R. 5376, Inflation Reduction Act of 2022; monitor tax proposals related to capital gains.

Monitor proposals related to carried interest, including H.R. 1068, Carried Interest Fairness Act of 2021, and H.R. 5376, Inflation Reduction Act of 2022; monitor tax proposals related to capital gains.
Monitor proposals related to carried interest; monitor tax proposals related to capital gains.
Monitor implementation of P.L. 119-21, the One Big Beautiful Bill Act.
